code:
circuit = cirq.Circuit()
circuit.append(cirq.H(qubits[0]))
circuit.append(cirq.H(qubits[1]))
circuit.append(cirq.H(qubits[2]))
## Begin Oracle
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[0]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[1]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.CCZ(qubits[0], qubits[1], qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[0]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[1]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[2]))
## End Oracle
## Begin Diffuser
circuit.append(cirq.H(qubits[0]))
circuit.append(cirq.H(qubits[1]))
circuit.append(cirq.H(qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[0]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[1]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.H(qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.CNOT(qubits[0], qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.CNOT(qubits[1], qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.H(qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[0]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[1]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.H(qubits[0]))
circuit.append(cirq.H(qubits[1]))
circuit.append(cirq.H(qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.SWAP(qubits[2], qubits[0]))
circuit.append(cirq.XX(qubits[2], qubits[0])**1 )
## End Diffuser
## Begin Oracle
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[0]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[1]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.CCZ(qubits[0], qubits[1], qubits[2]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[0]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[1]))
circuit.append(cirq.X(qubits[2]))
## End Oracle
circuit.append(cirq.measure(qubits[0], key='q0'))
circuit.append(cirq.measure(qubits[1], key='q1'))
circuit.append(cirq.measure(qubits[2], key='q2'))
